name: dash_extendable_graph
description: plotly-dash custom component. Adds Plotly.extendTraces() support to dash_core_components.Graph()

scripts.build:py: node ./extract-meta src/lib/components > dash_extendable_graph/metadata.json && copyfiles package.json dash_extendable_graph && python -c "import dash; dash.development.component_loader.generate_classes('dash_extendable_graph', 'dash_extendable_graph/metadata.json')"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:js & npm run build:js-dev & npm run build:py

author: Brad Liang brad@bliang.com
